TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ColumnProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 為資料行提供者 (Provider) 提供基底類別 (Base Class)。

span.span: Provides a base class for column providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行提供者必須擴充此類別。Column providers must extend this class. 類別和 ADO.NET Entity Framework 類別會擴充此類別的提供者。The class and the ADO.NET Entity Framework class are providers that extend this class.

span.span: The column provider.
The attribute collection.
Adds default attributes.
The attribute collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`attributes`參數不包含集合，但是模型提供者需要這個屬性，加入物件。If the `attributes` parameter does not contain the collection, but the model provider requires this attribute, the object is added. 如果`attributes`參數不包含集合與此提供者代表的資料行是字串，加入物件。If the `attributes` parameter does not contain the collection and the column that is represented by this provider is a string, the object is added.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示資料行是否是其他不在模型資料內容中的屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the column is an additional property that is not in the model's data context.

value.span: 如果資料行是其他不在模型資料內容中的屬性則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the column is an additional property that is not in the model's data context; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是不在資料內容通常是來自於檢視或計算的內容的資料行。Columns that are not in the data context typically come from a view or calculated property. 值屬性可用來判斷是否支援資料行的作業，例如排序。The value of the property can be used to determine whether column operations such as sorting are supported. 比方說，實作介面的資料模型將不會支援排序傳回的屬性`true`如屬性，因為資料行不存在資料庫中。For example, the implementation of the interface of the data model will not support sorting on properties that return `true` for the property, because the column does not exist in the database.

span.span: if the column is part of a foreign key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性未設定為強型別的實體的參考資料行之資料表實體 （資料模型中的資料表物件） 的成員。This property is not set for strongly typed entity reference columns that are members of the table entity (a table object in the data model).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指定資料提供者所定義的資料行是否接受 null 值。This property specifies whether the column accepts null values as defined by the data provider. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Handling Null Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md)。For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md).
